评论详情: My daughter normally wears a small or medium in men’s. We ordered the large because she wanted it bigger and it almost didn’t zip. The size description is way off.
Bought for Burning Man - nice jacket  Regarding measurements, I am 5'9 185 pds. Neck 15.5, chest 40. For this jacket I bought sizes small and medium, and small fit best
Zipper broke after only wearing twice.

评论概述: When I was a young boy

评论概述: More like outerwear than a blazer!
评论详情: Expected something like a blazer to wear to a party. Is like canvas and more like an outerwear jacket. Still, very cool looking, a bit heavy, and nice quality.

评论概述: Needs some alterations but nice quality
评论详情: Originally ordered a 3xl, but was a tad tight in the shoulders and hips. Exchanged for a 4xl which is a tad big in the shoulders and hips, but much more comfortable. Works perfectly for me with some minor alterations. Also the sleeves were about 4 inches too long, but not a big deal.

评论概述: Great looking and comfortable stage jacket
评论详情: Great looking and comfortable stage jacket. I cut the front and back buttons off,  to avoid scratching up my guitars.

评论概述: My daughter is huge MCR Black Parade fan
评论详情: My daughter bought this (big) with her Christmas money. The stitching is good quality, the fabric has a denim feel to it. I read a review that said the buttons were cheap, but that was a lie. The buttons on this is very nice. My daughter bought it big so it fits as expected. Shipping was a bit slow, but ships from England, so we weren’t in a hurry. I’d purchase this again.

评论概述: Way too small ordered a 4x expecting a 3x and got a 2x
评论详情: Way too small.

My band did a MCR cover set and it was absolutely perfect and made the show amazing. It’s great material but I actually tailored it to fit better because it’s more square shaped for a masculine figure. There’s also a small pocket inside which I liked lol.
It appears to be good quality.
Bought this for my son to be a Beatle from Sgt Pepper and it was PERFECT. Very well made, will keep for years as future costumes.

I could not find a woman’s jacket that was reasonable price for a Christmas theme costume party, so I went with this men’s jacket in a Medium to be on the safe side and not risk being too tight. It’s a bit too big in shoulders and sleeve length for me, but I expected that with men’s size. I may have been able to fit in a Small, but there’s no time to exchange now and it will be fine. The quality is very good for the price. It’s heavier than expected, well made, zipper is solid and strong. I found a hat, already have black boots and white pants, white wig, now am all set to be a Nutcracker! This shipped from the UK via DHL (I am in CA) and arrived exactly on the day Amazon tracking estimated as no later than.
This is a well made coat, reasonably priced and attractive. It fits well and looks great. A real buy for the money.
True to size.
It could use some fitting but it does the job. Not bad solid stuff sure thang yeah yeah
I usually wear a 2X, I ordered a 3X, barely could get it on.

I use this jacket on stage with a Pink Floyd tribute band. It seems pretty high quality for the price. I ordered a large, which is what I usually wear. Way too tight. I sent it back for an X-large. Still a little too tight but wearable. I didn't want to send it back. I probably needed a 2-X.

评论概述: Mens small is like a women's large
评论详情: The fit was quite roomy, as anticipated for a petite girl. We found no issues with the buttons at all. Seems to be decent quality for cosplay etc.

评论概述: Button were a disaster and killed the look for the whole jacket
评论详情: The product quality is overall okay but the button shine was gone and looked really really bad. I ordered 3 one after the another hoping to get a good piece but all of them were equally worse. Decided against wearing for the party I ordered and returned
Cool jacket. Runs a bit small. Order up a size if you don’t want it fitted.

This jacket is the closest replica to a Black Parade jacket ive found! The quality is amazing! It came perfectly packaged and in great condition! My husband has already worn it multiple times and I can't wait to see him wear it to see MCR.
I am an XL- XXL in T-shirts, I bought an 3XL just to be sure that it would fit, it runs small.

i’m in love!! i sized up as i usually do when shopping online, and it fits pretty true to size, maybe half an inch small. way better quality and thicker than i expected! gonna wear it to the MCR reunion show.

My son loved this jacket.  He wanted to be Gerard Way for Halloween and by the time we got around to ordering the jacket it wasn't going to make it in time without some MAJOR help.  Thankfully the supplier went above and beyond to help us get this in the US in time.  They were amazing and the product was exactly as advertised.  Thanks for making my son's halloween!!!
Fits great but took longer than exected to arrive

评论概述: Let the Drums Roll - here comes THE jacket!!!
评论详情: Fabulous!  The sleeves are too long on me - but that is because it is a unisex jacket.  I will have to have them shortened, or, I can just casually roll them.  But the jacket is primo great!  It is very fun - made well - no issues with buttons as the other reviewer.  It came in a timely fashion and is really spot on!  I feel like a majorette wearing this - but even though I am not in that age range - it really does not make me look silly.  It is timely, fashionable, durable, and nicely made.  A good purchase at this price!!! I am very pleased with this jacket.
Buttons started popping off on day one. Low quality. Daughter is terribly disappointed.

I love this product! I'm using this for Ray from My Chemical Romance. I am a female with a 36 C chest and ordered the men's small because that's the men size I'd usually get. This fits way better than I thought it was going to! I am very pleased with my purchase.
Amazing jacket!  Excellent quality!  Highly recommend!
Go up a size to what you normally take. The item is smaller than stated.

Siempre me había gustado tener este tipo de chaquetas tipo “circo” des de hace 10 años y nunca había encontrado una que me convenciera!! 🤯🥹 Pero estas me ENCANTAN las 2 que me he comprado de esta marca!! Son preciosas!!! Para mi no son “de disfraz” ni de cosplay. Para mi son de VESTIR!!! Para ir por la calle con mucha personalidad y estilo.  RO ROX SE HA CONVERTIDO EN MI MARCA DE ROPA PREFERIDA!!! 😍😍❤️🖖🏼 Quiero tener los 4 modelosss en 2XL!! (Me regaláis alguna señores de la tienda? 😅). He visitado la web, y todo lo que tienen es genial, pero hay muuuy poco para hombre!! 😲😿 Queremos más ropa para HOMBRE please!! 😀🔥🔥 La talla es adecuada, aunque como yo tengo barriga, las mangas me van un trozo largo y se han de arreglar. Suerte que mi madre es modista.🙌🏻👍🏻  Un abrazo del artista Xavi Leñador des de “La Casa Artistica” cerca de Barcelona. 😃❤️ Me encantaría visitar la tienda algún día.
J'ai prix une grandeur plus grande que je prends habituellement et il est trop petit le zipper ne s'attache pas... sniff sniff.

regalata a una fan de my chemical romance è stata molto apprezzata.

Love the jacket, it's a nice fit and decent quality. The only issue I had wat the buttons are very loosely attached and one had fallen off in transit. Would recommend reinforcing the stitching of the buttons, particularly if wearing to a gig or convention.

What a great company Ro Rox is. i bought a gothic Parade Jacket from them it looks smart and fits well. i read the reviews before I ordered and bought a size larger than I am chest wise , it was good advice the larger size fits like a glove. I cannot fault the Quality well made and the price was excellent. One thing is the zip which I will be replacing with hook & eyes fastening. I would highly recommend this company to anyone buying steam punk clothing.
Queda muy muy bien y la talla es perfecta.  Buen material y se lava fácil!!!

passt wie angegossen, tolle Qualität, sieht sehr gut aus!
Great quality feel.

Very happy with this purchase!  The only flaw I found was that the buttons seem to be 'tarnished'  not so new-looking. But otherwise, I am happy with this buy.

La chaqueta cumple con las expectativas. Es un tejido fuerte pero no grueso, resulta cómoda cuando la tienes puesta. Aunque eso sí, le he tenido que agregar unas hombreras, porque no lleva y queda algo caída de hombros. Pero en general he quedado muy satisfecho con la compra. Es exactamente como en la fotografía de venta. No engaña.
Pleasantly surprised by the quality of this jacket. Bought for fancy dress party, was perfect

Ro Rox has been really helpful and saved the day after delay of giving gift because of lockdown.  Fantastic customer service. Thank you.

Very happy overall with this jacket but don't wear it in the wet. Got caught out in the rain and my white shirt now has pink patches on it where the dye has run. (Luckily the shirt was only £3 frpom a charity shop.)

Optik und Verarbeitung gut, da ich schon mehrere Jacken bestellt habe, bin ich davon ausgegangen das ich die gleichen Masse auf Alle Jacken verwenden kann zu mal die dazu gehörige Tabelle das gleiche Glauben lässt. ist ein Irrtum. Diese Jacke kann man genau eine Nummer gemacht kleiner bestellen als es sonst wird. Ich behalte zwar die Jacke da ich ihr Aussehen verändere und dabei kann ich Änderungen wegen der Größe vornehmen.

consegna puntuale come annunciato, il prodotto è di buona qualità con belle finiture. le misure sono un po' abbondanti, ma forse per colpa mia che mi sono lasciata ingannare dal nome (giacca stretta).  nel complesso la soddisfazione è molto alta.

Die Jacke sieht schon ziemlich gei... aus. Für den Preis mehr als in Ordnung. Weiße Reithose, schwarze Reitstiefel, und fertig ist der Gardeoffizier. Leider in M etwas zu groß. Die dazu passende Weste in M passt wie angegossen.
